name: Car Scissor Jack Drill Adapter, Chrome Vanadium Steel Save Labor Jack Wrench Drill Adapter, Automotive Repair Accessories, Suitable for 1/2 Inch Drive Impact or 13/16 Inch Lug Wrench
short_description: High Quality: This scissor jack drill adapter is crafted from premium chromium-vanadium steel, renowned for its exceptional strength, hardness and wear resistance, making it ideal for heavy-duty automotive tools. Unlike ordinary steel or alloy adapters that bend, deform, or strip under pressure, chromium-vanadium steel maintains structural integrity even when subjected to the high torque required for lifting vehicles.

Wide Compatibility: Measuring 1.96 x 0.78 inches, the adapter features a compact, space-saving design for easy storage and portability, fitting neatly into vehicle boots for emergency tyre changes. Its recessed groove boasts a 1/2-inch inner diameter and 13/16-inch outer diameter, a universal specification compatible with most ring or two-hole scissor jacks on the market.

Easy Installation: Installing this jack drill adapter is remarkably straightforward, taking mere minutes to master. First, locate the jack's drive point and slide the adapter's groove into position, ensuring a secure lock. Next, take the included bolt and washer, thread them through the adapter's hole, and tighten the bolt to firmly secure the adapter to the jack. Finally, connect a compatible electric drill to the adapter's drive end. Once connected, you can swiftly raise or lower the jack.

Versatile and Convenient: This adapter significantly improves the usability of scissor jacks. Manually cranking a scissor jack is often time-consuming and laborious. By converting to a power drill-driven mode, this adapter reduces vehicle lifting time, making tyre changes or undercarriage inspections quicker and easier.

Package Includes: This product is supplied in a pouch packaging, with each set containing one chrome-vanadium steel scissor jack drill bit adapter. Whether handling a flat tyre at the roadside or performing routine maintenance, this adapter transforms cumbersome tasks into swift, effortless operations, meeting your operational requirements.
product_description: Specifications: Material: chromium-vanadium steel Color: black, silver Size: 1.96 x 0.78" Weight: 100g/3.52oz Package Include: 1pc scissor jack drill adapter Features: -Durability: Manufactured from high-strength chromium-vanadium steel, significantly enhancing durability and load-bearing capacity. -Practical Tool: The precise size, sturdy material, wide compatibility and easy operation make it an indispensable tool accessory in automotive maintenance, engineering work and other fields.
